translation.en: [man] I was there when everything changed.
translation.es: Yo estuve ahí cuando todo cambió.

translation.en: Forty years ago.
[man] It was our third world war, and humanity was determined to end itself.
translation.es: TERCERA GUERRA MUNDIAL Era nuestra tercera guerra mundialy la humanidad solo buscaba exterminarse.

translation.en: [man] Then, on the edge of annihilation,
translation.es: Y ya al borde de la aniquilación,

translation.en: an alien saved us.
[man] He smashed our tools of war.
[man] He forced us to stop fighting,
translation.es: Nos obligó a dejar de luchar

translation.en: and shut down World War III in one fucking day.
translation.es: y acabó con la Tercera Guerra Mundialen un solo maldito día.

translation.en: We called him
[man] For the first time in history,
translation.es: Por primera vez en la historia,

translation.en: world peace appeared possible.
-Good evening, America. -Mom?
I'm award-winning journalist Van Dawson, and this is Van Dawson Tonight.
translation.es: Soy el galardonado periodista Van Dawson,y esto es Van Dawson Tonight.

translation.en: We eagerly await the 40th anniversary of Marvelous Man Day.
translation.es: Esperamos ansiosos el 40 aniversariodel Día de Marvelous Man.

translation.en: The day Marvelous Man appeared from the sky
translation.es: El día que Marvelous Man bajó del cielo

translation.en: to single-handedly end World War III.
translation.es: para terminarcon la Tercera Guerra Mundial sin ayuda.

translation.en: Will our first superhero
continue to remain staunchly neutral in human conflicts?
translation.es: seguirá siendo neutralen los conflictos humanos?

translation.en: Will he act against the expansionist hive mind Anubis?
translation.es: ¿Va a actuarcontra la mente expansionista de Anubis?

translation.en: Will he condemn President Nick Nukem's aggressive military rhetoric?
translation.es: ¿Condenará la retórica militar agresivadel presidente Nick Nukem?

translation.en: We now go live to the Citadel of Justice,
translation.es: Vamos a la Ciudadela de la Justicia,

translation.en: where Marvelous Man is moments away from giving his yearly M Day address.
translation.es: donde Marvelous Manestá por dar su discurso anual del Día M.

translation.en: [man singing] M Day!
[man singing] M Day!
People of Earth…
this is Marvelous Man.
Come on! Come on! Check this out!
Look at that. That's my hero!
For four decades, I have protected you.
translation.es: Durante cuatro décadas, los he protegido.

translation.en: I saved you.
Boom!
I don't feel anything.
I'm a prisoner in this bulletproof skin.
translation.es: Soy prisionero de mi piel antibalas.

translation.en: Why does Marvelous Man look so sad, Mom?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Marvelous Man se ve tan triste?

translation.en: And when I close my eyes,
this is what I hear.
[man] Please, help me!
Why? Why didn't you save us?
-[man] Why didn't you save us? -[woman] Where are you?
-[man] You're supposed to be our savior! -[woman] Where are you? Where are you?
translation.es: - ¡Se supone que eres nuestro salvador!- ¿Dónde estás?

translation.en: -Where are you? -[man] Our savior!
[Marvelous Man] If I sleep,
people die.
Real inspiring speech, Cal.
Wait, is…
is that caltronite?
No! [exhales]
[whispers] What?
I'm tired of hiding.
I'm tired.
So I've found my escape.
No. Don't do this, Cal!
I found it.
-No! -What happened?
Mom!
-[The Speed] Cecilia? -[Cecilia] Yeah?
Are we live?
Marvelous Man is dead.
Clear my schedule.
What we have just witnessed
is obviously a dark day for mankind.
translation.es: es un día oscuro para la humanidad.

translation.en: There are no words to properly express
what just happened
and what we have lost
as a nation,
as a species,
as a planet.
[man] Fatality.
[female computer] The Guardians of Justice will save you.
translation.es: Los guardianes de la justicialos salvarán.

translation.en: ♪ Abraham Lincoln can leave his bed ♪
translation.es: SELLO DEL PRESIDENTE DE ESTADOS UNIDOS

translation.en: My fellow Americans,
an immigrant from another planet came to our shores
translation.es: Un inmigrante de otro planetavino a nuestras costas

translation.en: and made not only a life for himself,
translation.es: y no solo construyó una vida,

translation.en: but created a lasting legacy as well.
translation.es: también creó un legado que perdurará.

translation.en: In the wake of his death,
America will continue to protect the legacy of Marvelous Man.
translation.es: Estados Unidos continuará protegiendoel legado de Marvelous Man.

translation.en: We will prevent the escalation of nuclear conflict.
We will curtail the homosexual epidemic that is gripping our great nation.
translation.es: Reduciremos la epidemia de homosexualesque infecta nuestra gran nación.

translation.en: Asshole!
And I promise you that even with Marvelous Man gone,
translation.es: Y les prometo que, aun sin Marvelous Man,

translation.en: our enemies will continue to fear us.
God bless you, and God bless America.
translation.es: Dios los bendiga y a los Estados Unidos.

translation.en: We're fucked, people!
Aw, Phil.
Now that Marvelous Man is gone, who is going to save us?
People on the streets are going crazy. It's as if the whole world has…
translation.es: La gente se está volviendo loca.Es como si el mundo entero…

translation.en: has lost all hope.
[man] The year is 1960.
Marvelous Man has brought rapid technological advancement,
causing social turmoil and an escalation of street-level violence.
translation.es: lo que causó agitación socialy violencia callejera.

translation.en: [man] In this asphalt jungle, we join a lone vigilante, the Knight Hawk,
translation.es: En esta jungla de asfalto,nos unimos al vigilante Knight Hawk

translation.en: conducting a crusade against costumed crime kingpin The Demander.
translation.es: en su cruzadacontra el capo del crimen The Demander.

translation.en: [man] In this moment of peril, a god aligned himself with a man.
translation.es: En medio del peligro,un dios se alió con un hombre.

translation.en: Together, they would forge a friendship
that became the cornerstone of the Guardians of Justice.
translation.es: que resultó la basede los guardianes de la justicia.

translation.en: [reporter] For our next segment,
an exclusive interview with the former CIA operative who stole a god's heart.
translation.es: entrevista con la exagente de la CIAque robó el corazón de un dios.

translation.en: America's princess, now America's widow,
translation.es: La princesa de EE. UU.,ahora la viuda de EE. UU.,

translation.en: And we're live in three, two…
Ms. Louis, you have my condolences.
translation.es: Señora Louis, le doy mis condolencias.

translation.en: The world shares your grief.
How are you processing what your husband has done?
translation.es: ¿Cómo procesa lo que hizo su esposo?

translation.en: He wouldn't do that.
He wouldn't do that to the world, to the Guardians,
translation.es: No le haría eso al mundo,a los guardianes,

translation.en: to me.
I think there can be no question Marvelous Man committed suicide.
translation.es: Creo que no hay duda.Marvelous Man se suicidó.

translation.en: [Laura] You don't know what you're talking about.
translation.es: No sabe de lo que habla.

translation.en: I've been watching it and re-watching it over and over and over again.
translation.es: Lo he estado viendo una y otra vez.

translation.en: He was murdered.
Murdered?
[in Arabic] Shocking revelations from Marvelous Man's widow.
[in Hebrew] Was Marvelous Man murdered? We will investigate the allegations tonight at ten…
translation.es: ¿Marvelous Man fue asesinado?Investigaremos las acusaciones esta noche.

translation.en: [reporter in French] Suicide or murder?
The world demands answers. The last 24 hours have shaken our planet to its core.
translation.es: Las últimas 24 horashan sacudido al planeta.

translation.en: If you're right, then there's one question the world needs answered.
translation.es: Hay una pregunta que el mundonecesita que respondan.

translation.en: Who, if anyone, killed Marvelous Man?
translation.es: ¿Quién, de haber sido alguien,mató a Marvelous Man?

translation.en: We need to hear from the Guardians of Justice,
and specifically from Marvelous Man's second-in-command.
translation.es: y específicamente,del lugarteniente de Marvelous Man.

translation.en: Knight Hawk, where are you?
[Knight Hawk] Computer, call the Guardians.
King Tsunami here.
Speed here.
Mm. Awsome Man present.
Sorry. I'm eating a taco.
Blue-Scream online.
Black Bow here.
[Knight Hawk] With Marvelous Man gone, it's time to suit up,
translation.es: Sin Marvelous Man, es hora de actuar,

translation.en: assume control of the Guardians, and protect the planet.
translation.es: de asumir el control de los guardianesy proteger el planeta.

translation.en: [man] Golden Goddess!
[Knight Hawk] She's the princess of the god realm.
translation.es: Es la princesa de los dioses.

translation.en: [man] The Speed!
[Knight Hawk] The only person faster than Marvelous Man.
translation.es: La única más rápida que Marvelous Man.

translation.en: [man] Black Bow!
[Knight Hawk] Expert marksman
and reality star.
-[man] Blue-Scream! -[screaming]
[Knight Hawk] Whose sonic scream contains immense power.
translation.es: Cuyo grito sónicocontiene un inmenso poder.

translation.en: [man] King Tsunami!
[Knight Hawk] Overlord of the oceans.
[man] Awsome Man!
[Knight Hawk] Who possesses a magic word that gives him the power of seven gods.
translation.es: Que posee una palabra mágicaque le da el poder de siete dioses.

translation.en: Together, we form the Guardians of Justice.
translation.es: Somos los guardianes de la justicia.

translation.en: With Marvelous Man gone,
there's a power vacuum that could rip this world apart.
translation.es: hay un vacío de poderque puede destruir el mundo.

translation.en: We can't have that happen.
Yeah. How are we gonna do that? All of us combined are not equal to Marvelous Man.
translation.es: Sí, ¿cómo lo haremos?Todos juntos no igualamos a Marvelous Man.

translation.en: Speak for yourself, human.
Oh, come on. Don't fight.
You're a fucking fish.
What can you do? You can talk to fish. "Oh, wow! I'm so fucking powerful!"
translation.es: ¿Qué puedes hacer? Hablas con los peces."¡Qué poderoso soy!".

translation.en: Pathetic street whore. I'm a king, and I demand respect!
translation.es: Zorra patética.¡Soy un rey y exijo respeto!

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Enough!
You're supposed to be role models. Heroes.
translation.es: Deben ser modelos a seguir. Héroes.

translation.en: Try and act like it.
Blue-Scream's right.
None of us compare to Marvelous Man.
translation.es: Ninguno se compara con Marvelous Man.

translation.en: But if we work together as a team,
we could save this world.
We can honor our fallen Guardian.
translation.es: Podemos honrar a nuestro guardián caído.

translation.en: We could strive to be
marvelous.
Everyone knows Marvelous Man didn't just protect a city or a town.
translation.es: Todos saben que Marvelous Manno solo protegía una ciudad o un pueblo.

translation.en: He protected the world.
Now that's on us.
Awsome Man, Speed, Golden Goddess,
you're the only ones fast enough to handle an international crisis.
translation.es: son los únicos tan rápidospara manejar una crisis internacional.

translation.en: There's a squad of cyborg T-Rexes on the loose in Syria.
translation.es: Hay un escuadrón de tiranosaurios cyborgsueltos en Siria.

translation.en: Take them down and bring them to justice.
translation.es: Derrótenlos y llévenlos ante la justicia.

translation.en: Consider it done.
[Knight Hawk] A massive mudslide has thousands trapped and dying.
translation.es: Un deslave masivodejó a miles atrapados y muriendo.

translation.en: Awsome Man, the Red Cross needs you in Thailand.
translation.es: Awesome Man,la Cruz Roja te necesita en Tailandia.

translation.en: The Hawk drones will back you up with supplies.
[Hawk drone] Activate.
You can count on me.
[Knight Hawk] Speed, I need you to pick up Blue-Scream and drop him in LA.
translation.es: Speed, necesito que lleves a Blue Screama Los Ángeles.

translation.en: A new street drug called "Mellow Devil" is causing people to lose their minds.
translation.es: Una nueva droga llamada diablo suaveestá haciendo que la gente enloquezca.

translation.en: -We've got to extinguish the fires. -You got it.
He can't do that alone. I should go with him.
translation.es: No puede hacerlo solo. Debería ir con él.

translation.en: -I'll be fine. Speed, let's go. -I'm on my way.
translation.es: - Estaré bien. Speed, vamos.- Voy en camino.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Wait, Speed!
After you've dropped Scream in LA, I need you to get back here,
translation.es: Vuelve después de dejar a Screamen Los Ángeles

translation.en: because we've gotta get Black Bow to Peru.
translation.es: para llevar a Black Bow a Perú.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. What am I, the Guardians' delivery boy?
You're whatever the Guardians need you to be. Now, move!
translation.es: Eres lo que los guardianes necesiten.¡Muévete ya!

translation.en: And me?
[Knight Hawk] The Scottish Skull has hijacked an American submarine
off the coast of New Zeamar.
translation.es: en la costa de New Zeamar.

translation.en: Walker! How did you break this feed?
Despite what you'd like to believe, Atticus,
translation.es: A pesar de lo que crees, Atticus,

translation.en: there are people smarter than you.
translation.es: hay gente más inteligente que tú.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Addison Walker.
She runs a private military group funded by a few dozen corporations.
translation.es: Dirige un grupo militar privadofinanciado por varias empresas.

translation.en: Her objective? Maintain global economic stability at all cost.
[Knight Hawk] She's playing chess and only she gets to see the board.
translation.es: Está jugando al ajedrezy solo ella puede ver el tablero.

translation.en: What do you want?
As you know, Marvelous Man was leading negotiations
translation.es: Como saben,Marvelous Man estaba en negociaciones

translation.en: for a worldwide nuclear disarmament.
Since his death, those negotiations have spun out of control.
translation.es: Desde su muerte,esas negociaciones se salieron de control.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] That sounds like your problem,
not mine.
Oh. It's going to become everyone's problem soon.
Because of the questions surrounding Marvelous Man's death,
translation.es: Debido a las preguntassobre la muerte de Marvelous Man,

translation.en: every country is pointing the finger at one another.
translation.es: todos los países se acusan entre sí.

translation.en: China is saying Russia had him killed.
translation.es: China dice que Rusia lo mandó a matar.

translation.en: Iran and Iraq are sure the job was done by the Americans.
translation.es: Irán e Irak están segurosde que fueron los estadounidenses.

translation.en: That doesn't even make sense.
The steps that lead us to war rarely do.
translation.es: Los pasos que llevan a guerrasrara vez lo tienen.

translation.en: The only way this ends without an all-out nuclear holocaust
translation.es: El único modode que esto no acabe en holocausto nuclear

translation.en: is if you find out who really killed Marvelous Man.
translation.es: es si descubresquién mató a Marvelous Man.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] So you don't think it was a suicide?
I don't.
But from what I hear, neither do you.
translation.es: Pero por lo que oí, tampoco tú.

translation.en: I don't have an opinion.
And I won't have an opinion until my investigation is completed.
translation.es: Y no la tendréhasta que termine mi investigación.

translation.en: Yes, but I know the problem is you're looking in the wrong place.
translation.es: Sí, pero sé que el problemaes que buscas en el lugar equivocado.

translation.en: Are you fucking with me or what?
You need to look at the Guardians themselves.
The Guardians? What do you know that I don't?
translation.es: ¿Los guardianes? ¿Qué sabes tú que yo no sepa?

translation.en: [Walker] Time is running short. Find the answer.
translation.es: El tiempo se acaba. Busca la respuesta.

translation.en: Or I'll arrest you and every one of your super friends
translation.es: O te arrestaré a tiy a todos tus superamigos

translation.en: before declaring martial law
on the world.
Knight Hawk to Guardians.
Complete your mission
and report to the Hawk's Nest.
translation.es: y repórtense a la guarida de Hawk.

translation.en: ♪ I'm safe, let's go to bed And think something, somehow ♪
Jesus Christ!
That's fucked up, man.
I know. I know. But think about it.
Marvelous Man is dead. Right? Huh?
So, you think if we wore his skin,
we'd be bulletproof?
I mean, I guess. I-it's like a bulletproof jacket. You know?
translation.es: Supongo. Es como un chaleco antibalas.

translation.en: It… it still goes through. It hurts like shit.
[officer 2 laughing] No, it doesn't! At least, I think it doesn't. Shit. I mean…
translation.es: ¡No! Al menos, creo que no. Digo…

translation.en: 'Cause his whole body is bulletproof. It's impenetrable, man. All right?
translation.es: Porque su cuerpo es a prueba de balas.Es impenetrable, ¿verdad?

translation.en: If you wore his skin, you'd still be a doughboy with shit muscles.
translation.es: Con su piel, seguirías siendo un soldaditocon músculos de mierda.

translation.en: [officer 2] Oh, fuck you. Fuck you. You know how much I've been lifting.
translation.es: Vete a la mierda.Sabes cuánto estoy levantando.

translation.en: [officer 1] Yeah, yeah. You're lifting beer and donuts, man.
-That still counts. -[officer 1] Yeah. In your world.
[officer 2] What's the count at?
[officer 1] Three and a half. Look at this one.
-[officer 2] Smiley face? -[officer 1] Uh-huh.
-[officer 2] Shit. -[officer 1] Oh, well…
[officer 2] Another smiley face.
[officer 1] Oh, okay. Look at this one here.
[officer 2] Fucking ground beef. [officer 1] How's that wife of yours, man?
translation.es: - Maldita carne molida.- ¿Cómo está tu esposa?

translation.en: [officer 2] She's good. She's a little stressed out.
Kid had an accident. You know?
-[officer 1] Yeah? -[officer 2] Yeah.
[officer 1 scoffs] Hey, when it rains, it pours.
[officer 2] Tell me about it. I'm missing that single life though.
translation.es: Y que lo digas.Extraño la vida de soltero.

translation.en: [officer 1] Yeah. Look at this one here. The eyeball's out.
translation.es: Sí. Mira este.El globo ocular está fuera.

translation.en: [officer 1] Single life? You are missing it.
-Hey, I forgot to ask you… -[officer 1] What?
-[officer 2] Another smiley face. -[officer 1] Yeah.
[officer 2] How was that… how was that date the other night?
translation.es: ¿Cómo estuvo tu cita la otra noche?

translation.en: [officer 1] What date? Oh, yeah! The one with the big old…?
[officer 2] Yeah, the tig old bitties.
Oh, man, she was… Crazy, but she was nice.
translation.es: Cielos. Estaba… loca. Pero era agradable.

translation.en: [officer 2] Yeah. I fucking love titties, man.
[officer 1] I know you do.
Oh. Look at this. Oh sh--
-Stinks! -[officer 2] That smells like shit, man.
-[officer 1] Oh, man! -[officer 2] Fucking maggots and shit.
translation.es: - ¡Cielos!- Con gusanos y toda la mierda.

translation.en: [officer 1] Oh, yeah.
[officer 1] Oh. Look at this one.
[exhales, whispers] Shit.
Got a splitting headache, I guess. I don't know.
translation.es: Supongo que le dolía la cabeza.

translation.en: That's disgusting.
[officer 1] Check this one out here.
-[officer 2] That's not right, man. -[officer 1] Oh, man. Faceless.
translation.es: - Eso no está bien.- Cielos. No tiene cara.
